description: AI-powered genomic analysis MCP server providing comprehensive DNA sequence prediction, variant analysis, and genomic feature annotation using Google DeepMind's AlphaGenome models
features: DNA Sequence Analysis: Predict chromatin accessibility, transcription start sites, DNase hypersensitivity
Variant Effect Prediction: Assess functional impact of genetic variants on genomic features
Pathogenicity Scoring: Score variants using 19 different algorithms for clinical interpretation
Genomic Interval Analysis: Analyze specific chromosomal regions for regulatory elements
Batch Processing: High-throughput analysis of multiple sequences or variants
Job Management: Background processing with progress tracking for long-running tasks
Mock Mode: Safe testing environment with simulated results

tools.name: predict_dna_sequence
tools.description: Predict genomic features for DNA sequences
tools.example_prompt: Use predict_dna_sequence with sequence "ATGCGATCGTAGCTAGCATGCAAATTTGGGCCCGTACGCATGCTAGCGATCGTAGCTAG" and organism "human"

tools.name: analyze_genomic_interval
tools.description: Analyze genomic intervals for regulatory features
tools.example_prompt: Use analyze_genomic_interval with interval "chr1:1000000-1002048" and output_types ["atac", "cage"]

tools.name: predict_variant_effects
tools.example_prompt: Use predict_variant_effects with variant "chr1:1001000A>G" and interval "chr1:1000000-1002048"

tools.name: score_variant_pathogenicity
tools.example_prompt: Score variant chr1:1001000A>G for pathogenicity using score_variant_pathogenicity with interval chr1:1000000-1002048

tools.name: validate_genomic_inputs
tools.example_prompt: Use validate_genomic_inputs with sequence "ATGCGATCG", variant "chr1:1000A>G", and interval "chr1:900-1100"

tools.name: get_supported_organisms
tools.example_prompt: What organisms are supported? Use get_supported_organisms

tools.name: get_example_data
tools.example_prompt: What example data is available? Use get_example_data

tools.name: submit_dna_sequence_prediction
tools.description: Submit DNA sequence prediction for background processing
tools.example_prompt: Submit a batch sequence analysis using submit_batch_sequence_analysis with input_file @examples/data/sequences.txt and job_name "batch_analysis"

tools.name: submit_variant_effect_prediction
tools.example_prompt: Submit variant effect prediction using submit_variant_effect_prediction with variant "chr1:1001000A>G" and interval "chr1:1000000-1002048"

tools.name: submit_variant_scoring
tools.example_prompt: Submit variant scoring using submit_variant_scoring with variant "chr1:1001000A>G" and interval "chr1:1000000-1002048"

tools.name: submit_batch_sequence_analysis
tools.example_prompt: Submit batch processing for all sequences in @examples/data/sequences.txt using submit_batch_sequence_analysis with job_name "multi_sequence_analysis"

tools.name: submit_batch_variant_analysis
tools.example_prompt: Process multiple variants using submit_batch_variant_analysis with variants ["chr1:1001000A>G", "chr1:1001100C>T"] and intervals ["chr1:1000000-1002048", "chr1:1000000-1002048"]

tools.name: get_job_status
tools.example_prompt: Check the status using get_job_status with job_id "your-job-id"

tools.name: get_job_result
tools.example_prompt: Get results using get_job_result with job_id "your-job-id"

tools.name: get_job_log
tools.description: View execution logs with tail option
tools.example_prompt: View logs using get_job_log with job_id "your-job-id" and tail 100

tools.name: cancel_job
tools.example_prompt: Cancel job using cancel_job with job_id "your-job-id"

tools.name: list_jobs
tools.description: List all jobs with optional status filter

scripts.name: dna_sequence_prediction.py
scripts.description: Predict genomic features for DNA sequences
scripts.example_command: mamba run -p ./env python scripts/dna_sequence_prediction.py --input examples/data/sample_sequence.txt --output-types atac cage --pretty

scripts.name: genomic_interval_analysis.py
scripts.description: Analyze genomic intervals for regulatory features
scripts.example_command: mamba run -p ./env python scripts/genomic_interval_analysis.py --interval chr1:1000000-1002048 --output-types atac cage

scripts.name: variant_effect_prediction.py
scripts.example_command: mamba run -p ./env python scripts/variant_effect_prediction.py --variant chr1:1001000A>G --interval chr1:1000000-1002048 --output results/variant_effects.json

scripts.name: variant_scoring.py
scripts.example_command: mamba run -p ./env python scripts/variant_scoring.py --variant chr1:1001000A>G --interval chr1:1000000-1002048

scripts.name: output_metadata.py
scripts.description: Retrieve API capabilities and output types

demo_data.description: Single 56bp test sequence for basic testing

demo_data.content_preview: Large DNA sequence for testing performance...
Multiple large sequences for batch testing...

dependency_installation: $PKG_MGR run -p ./env pip install loguru click pandas numpy tqdm
mcp_registration: mamba run -p ./env fastmcp install src/server.py --name AlphaGenome-MCP-Server

files_verified: ✓ All scripts exist and execute correctly
✓ Demo data files present with correct content
✓ All 18 tools registered in MCP server

test_results.script_execution: ✓ PASSED - Scripts run with mock mode
